.. _`cs-web-components-base-containers.detail-wrapper.__module__`:

=========================
containers/detail-wrapper
=========================

.. contents:: Local Navigation
   :local:
   :depth: 2

Description
===========



Wraps a React component, so that it can be used as the detailComponent in a
generic frame.


Contents
========

Classes
-------

- :ref:`cs-web-components-base-containers.detail-wrapper.DetailWrapper`
